posts.postText: Thanks for the donation! The steamid you provided doesn't seem to even own GMod, would you still like me to give VIP to that steamid, or a different one?
Definitely a different one, let me see if I can find the right one.
It's alright, I added you to VIP. Saw you on the server :P If you have any questions or wish to continue this conversation you can contact me here.
